summary.span: Defines the contract that ASP.NET implements to provide membership services using custom membership providers.

span.span: Defines the contract that ASP.NET implements to provide membership services using custom membership providers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 成員資格被為了讓您輕鬆地為您的 ASP.NET 應用程式使用許多不同的成員資格提供者。ASP.NET membership is designed to enable you to easily use a number of different membership providers for your ASP.NET applications. 您可以使用隨附於.NET Framework 中，提供成員資格提供者，或者您可以實作自己的提供者。You can use the supplied membership providers that are included with the .NET Framework, or you can implement your own provider. > [!NOTE] > 如果您不熟悉的 ASP.NET 成員資格功能，請參閱[成員資格簡介](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/79184d17-f4c7-4c9f-a073-cec4f5543980)才能繼續。If you are not familiar with the membership features of ASP.NET, see [Introduction to Membership](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/79184d17-f4c7-4c9f-a073-cec4f5543980) before continuing. 如需與成員資格相關的其他主題的清單，請參閱[使用成員資格管理使用者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd)。For a list of other topics related to membership, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd). 在實作自訂成員資格提供者時，您需要繼承抽象類別。When implementing a custom membership provider, you are required to inherit the abstract class. 有兩個主要的原因，建立自訂成員資格提供者。There are two primary reasons for creating a custom membership provider. - 您要將成員資格資訊儲存在.NET Framework 中，例如 FoxPro 資料庫、 Oracle 資料庫或其他資料來源所包含的成員資格提供者不支援的資料來源。You need to store membership information in a data source that is not supported by the membership providers included with the .NET Framework, such as a FoxPro database, an Oracle database, or other data source. - 您要管理使用不同於.NET Framework 所隨附的提供者所使用的資料庫結構描述的資料庫結構描述的成員資格資訊。You need to manage membership information using a database schema that is different from the database schema used by the providers that ship with the .NET Framework. 常見的範例會在公司或網站的 SQL Server 資料庫中已存在的成員資格資料。A common example of this would be membership data that already exists in a SQL Server database for a company or Web site. 抽象類別繼承自抽象類別。The abstract class inherits from the abstract class. 實作也必須實作的必要的成員。 implementations must also implement the required members of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性值會儲存在使用者與特定應用程式的相關的使用者資訊的資料來源。The property value is stored in the data source with related user information to associate a user with a particular application. 這個屬性是讀取/寫入，且預設值為如果未指定明確的屬性值。This property is read/write and defaults to the property value if not specified explicitly. 成員資格提供者儲存獨有的每個應用程式的使用者資訊，因為多個 ASP.NET 應用程式可以使用相同的資料來源不會發生衝突，如果建立了重複的使用者名稱。Because membership providers store user information uniquely for each application, multiple ASP.NET applications can use the same data source without running into a conflict if duplicate user names are created. 或者，多個 ASP.NET 應用程式可以使用相同的使用者資料來源藉由指定相同。Alternatively, multiple ASP.NET applications can use the same user data source by specifying the same . 在成員資格提供者實作中，您必須確認您的資料結構描述中包含和資料來源查詢與更新也包含。In your membership provider implementation, you will need to ensure that your data schema includes the and that data source queries and updates also include the . ## Examples 如需實作中，請參閱[實作設定檔提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98)。For an example of a implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接受輸入使用者名稱、 密碼、 密碼問題和密碼解答，並更新的密碼問題和解答，資料來源中的，如果提供的使用者名稱和密碼有效。Takes, as input, a user name, a password, a password question and a password answer, and updates the password question and answer in the data source if the supplied user name and password are valid. 如果提供的使用者名稱和密碼不正確，`false`傳回。If the supplied user name and password are not valid, `false` is returned. ## Examples 如需實作中，請參閱[實作設定檔提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98)。For an example of a implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 做為輸入，接受新的使用者、 密碼及電子郵件地址的名稱，並將新的使用者應用程式插入至資料來源。Takes, as input, the name of a new user, a password, and an email address and inserts a new user for the application into the data source. 方法會傳回填入新建立的使用者資訊的物件。The method returns a object populated with the information for the newly created user. 方法也會定義`out`參數 (在 Visual Basic 中，您可以使用`ByRef`) 傳回值，表示已成功建立使用者，或該的使用者建立失敗的原因。The method also defines an `out` parameter (in Visual Basic, you can use `ByRef`) that returns a value that indicates that the user was successfully created, or a reason that user creation failed. 方法會引發事件，如果事件處理常式已指定，並繼續執行或取消事件的結果為基礎建立使用者的動作。The method raises the event, if a event handler has been specified, and continues or cancels the create-user action based on the results of the event. 您可以使用虛擬方法，執行指定事件處理常式。You can use the virtual method to execute the specified event handler. ## Examples 如需實作中，請參閱[實作設定檔提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98)。For an example of a implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含布林值，指定在組態檔 (Web.config) 中使用`enablePasswordRetrieval`屬性。The property contains a Boolean value specified in the configuration file (Web.config) using the `enablePasswordRetrieval` attribute. 值，指出使用者是否可以使用方法來從資料來源擷取其目前的密碼。The value indicates whether users can use the method to retrieve their current password from the data source. 這個屬性是唯讀的。This property is read-only. 如果您的自訂成員資格提供者支援雜湊的密碼，您方法實作應擲回例外狀況，如果設`true`和密碼格式設定為`Hashed`。If your custom membership provider supports hashed passwords, your method implementation should throw an exception if is set to `true` and the password format is set to `Hashed`. 無法擷取雜湊的密碼。Hashed passwords cannot be retrieved. ## Examples 如需實作中，請參閱[實作設定檔提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98)。For an example of a implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接受輸入使用者名稱和密碼解答和從資料來源擷取該使用者的密碼並將密碼當做字串傳回。Takes, as input, a user name and a password answer and retrieves the password for that user from the data source and returns the password as a string. 方法可確保旗標設為`true`然後再執行任何動作。The method ensures that the flag is set to `true` before performing any action. 如果是`false`、擲回例外狀況。If is `false`, a exception is thrown. 也會檢查值屬性。 also checks the value of the property. 如果是`true`，會檢查提供的回應參數與資料來源中的預存的密碼解答的值。If is `true`, checks the value of the supplied answer parameter against the stored password answer in the data source. 如果不相符，擲回例外狀況。If they do not match, a exception is thrown. 如果您的自訂成員資格提供者支援雜湊的密碼，方法應該擲回例外狀況，如果屬性設定為`true`和密碼格式設定為`Hashed`。If your custom membership provider supports hashed passwords, the method should throw an exception if the property is set to `true` and the password format is set to `Hashed`. 無法擷取雜湊的密碼。Hashed passwords cannot be retrieved. ## Examples 如需實作中，請參閱[實作設定檔提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98)。For an example of a implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 做為輸入，接受電子郵件地址，並傳回其中電子郵件地址符合所提供的資料來源中的第一個使用者名稱`email`參數值。Takes, as input, an email address and returns the first user name from the data source where the email address matches the supplied `email` parameter value. 如果沒有使用者名稱找不到相符的電子郵件地址，`null`傳回。If no user name is found with a matching email address, `null` is returned. 如果找不到符合特定電子郵件地址的多個使用者名稱，則應該傳回只的第一個使用者名稱。If multiple user names are found that match a particular email address, only the first user name found should be returned. 您可以實作自訂的機制，可確保每個使用者名稱的唯一電子郵件地址，例如屬性支援提供者。You can implement a custom mechanism for ensuring a unique email address for each user name such as the property supported by the provider. ## Examples 如需實作中，請參閱[實作設定檔提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98)。For an example of a implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98).

span.span: The number of invalid password or password-answer attempts allowed before the membership user is locked out.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可搭配屬性，以防範不必要的來源，破解的密碼或密碼解答的成員資格使用者，透過重複嘗試。The property works in conjunction with the property to guard against an unwanted source guessing the password or password answer of a membership user through repeated attempts. 如果的無效密碼或提供成員資格使用者的密碼問題數目大於或等於屬性值所識別的分鐘數內，然後藉由設定鎖定成員資格使用者屬性`true`直到呼叫解除鎖定使用者方法。If the number of invalid passwords or password questions supplied for a membership user is greater than or equal to the property value within the number of minutes identified by the , then the membership user is locked out by setting the property to `true` until the user is unlocked by a call to the method. 如果提供有效的密碼或密碼解答之前到達值時，追蹤無效嘗試次數的計數器就會重設為零。If a valid password or password answer is supplied before the value is reached, the counter that tracks the number of invalid attempts is reset to zero. 無效的密碼和密碼解答嘗試累積彼此獨立。Invalid password and password-answer attempts accumulate independently of one another. 例如，如果屬性設定為 5，而且後面接著兩個無效的密碼解答嘗試進行三個無效的密碼嘗試次數，內，則必須進行兩個的多個無效的密碼嘗試次數（或三個的多個無效的密碼解答嘗試）被鎖定成員資格使用者。For example, if the property is set to 5, and three invalid password attempts are made followed by two invalid password-answer attempts, two more invalid password attempts (or three more invalid password-answer attempts) must be made within the for the membership user to be locked out. 如果屬性設定為`false`，不會追蹤無效的密碼解答嘗試。If the property is set to `false`, invalid password-answer attempts are not tracked. 在中，追蹤無效的密碼和密碼解答嘗試， ， ， ，和方法。Invalid password and password-answer attempts are tracked in the , , , , and methods. ## Examples 如需實作中，請參閱[實作設定檔提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98)。For an example of a implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回必須輸入要建立的有效密碼的特殊、 非字母字元的最小數目物件。The property returns the minimum number of special, non-alphabetic characters that must be entered to create a valid password for the object. 屬性值會設定在應用程式組態中，使用`minRequiredNonalphanumericCharacters`屬性[元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的成員資格](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)組態項目。The property value is set in the application configuration using the `minRequiredNonalphanumericCharacters` attribute of the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) configuration element. 非英數字元是字元的方法會傳回`false`。A non-alphanumeric character is a character for which the method returns `false`. ## Examples 下列範例所示[元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的成員資格](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)中的組態項目`system.web`應用程式的 Web.config 檔案區段。The following example shows the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) configuration element in the `system.web` section of the application's Web.config file. 它會指定應用程式使用的執行個體類別提供成員資格服務與集`minRequiredNonalphanumericCharacters`屬性設為 1 個字元。It specifies that the application use an instance of the class to provide membership services, and sets the `minRequiredNonalphanumericCharacters` attribute to 1 character. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會取得必須輸入要建立的有效密碼的字元數目下限物件。The property gets the minimum number of characters that must be entered to create a valid password for the object. 屬性值會設定在應用程式組態中，使用`minRequiredPasswordLength`屬性[元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的成員資格](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)組態項目。The property value is set in the application configuration using the `minRequiredPasswordLength` attribute of the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) configuration element. ## Examples 下列範例所示[元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的成員資格](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)中的組態項目`system.web`應用程式的 Web.config 檔案區段。The following example shows the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) configuration element in the `system.web` section of the application's Web.config file. 它會指定應用程式使用的執行個體類別提供成員資格服務與集`minRequiredPasswordLength`屬性設定為七個字元。It specifies that the application use an instance of the class to provide membership services, and sets the `minRequiredPasswordLength` attribute to seven characters. ``` ```

summary.span: Gets the number of minutes in which a maximum number of invalid password or password-answer attempts are allowed before the membership user is locked out.

span.span: Gets the number of minutes in which a maximum number of invalid password or password-answer attempts are allowed before the membership user is locked out.

value.span: 鎖定成員資格使用者以前，所允許的無效密碼或密碼解答嘗試次數上限的分鐘數。

span.span: The number of minutes in which a maximum number of invalid password or password-answer attempts are allowed before the membership user is locked out.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可搭配屬性，以防範不必要的來源，破解的密碼或密碼解答的成員資格使用者，透過重複嘗試。The property works in conjunction with the property to guard against an unwanted source guessing the password or password answer of a membership user through repeated attempts. 如果不正確的密碼或提供成員資格使用者的密碼問題數目超過所識別的分鐘數內，然後藉由設定鎖定成員資格使用者屬性`true`直到呼叫解除鎖定使用者方法。If the number of invalid passwords or password questions supplied for a membership user exceeds the within the number of minutes identified by the , then the membership user is locked out by setting the property to `true` until the user is unlocked by a call to the method. 如果之前提供有效的密碼或密碼解答會達到，追蹤無效嘗試次數的計數器就會重設為零。If a valid password or password answer is supplied before the is reached, the counter that tracks the number of invalid attempts is reset to zero. 無效的密碼和密碼解答嘗試累積彼此獨立。Invalid password and password-answer attempts accumulate independently of one another. 例如，如果屬性設定為 5，而且後面接著兩個無效的密碼解答嘗試進行三個無效的密碼嘗試次數，內，則必須進行兩個的多個無效的密碼嘗試次數（或三個的多個無效的密碼解答嘗試）被鎖定成員資格使用者的值。For example, if the property is set to 5, and three invalid password attempts are made followed by two invalid password-answer attempts, two more invalid password attempts (or three more invalid password-answer attempts) must be made within the value for the membership user to be locked out. 如果屬性設定為`false`，不會追蹤無效的密碼解答嘗試。If the property is set to `false`, invalid password-answer attempts are not tracked. 在中，追蹤無效的密碼和密碼解答嘗試， ， ， ，和方法。Invalid password and password-answer attempts are tracked in the , , , , and methods. ## Examples 如需實作中，請參閱[實作設定檔提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98)。For an example of a implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98).

summary.span: Gets a value indicating the format for storing passwords in the membership data store.

span.span: Gets a value indicating the format for storing passwords in the membership data store.

value.span: 其中一個 值，這個值表示將密碼儲存在資料存放區中的格式。

span.span: One of the values indicating the format for storing passwords in the data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性表示密碼會以儲存的格式。The property indicates the format that passwords are stored in. 使用`Hashed`僅`Clear`和`Encrypted`並未受到保護。Use `Hashed` only, `Clear` and `Encrypted` are not secure. `Hashed` 密碼已雜湊使用單向雜湊演算法和隨機產生的 salt 值儲存在資料庫中。`Hashed` passwords are hashed using a one-way hash algorithm and a randomly generated salt value when stored in the database. 驗證密碼時，它會將雜湊驗證的資料庫中的 salt 值。When a password is validated, it is hashed with the salt value in the database for verification. 無法擷取雜湊的密碼。Hashed passwords cannot be retrieved. `Encrypted` 密碼不安全的因為的缺口都可顯示您的資料庫內容，也可以公開加密金鑰。`Encrypted` passwords are not considered safe, as a breach that reveals your database contents can also expose the encryption key. 這表示可以解密加密的密碼，並且公開。This means your encrypted passwords could be decrypted and exposed. 您可以使用和虛擬方法的類別來加密和解密的密碼值，或者您可以提供您自己的加密程式碼。You can use the and virtual methods of the class to encrypt and decrypt password values, or you can supply your own encryption code. 如果您使用和虛擬方法的類別`Encrypted`密碼使用所提供的金鑰資訊加密[machineKey 項目 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4b5699a9-bc21-4c4a-85f1-8b3b8ebd2d46)您可以在組態項目。If you use the and virtual methods of the class, `Encrypted` passwords are encrypted using the key information supplied in the [machineKey Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4b5699a9-bc21-4c4a-85f1-8b3b8ebd2d46) element in your configuration. ## Examples 如需實作中，請參閱[實作設定檔提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98)。For an example of a implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會取得用來評估密碼複雜度的規則運算式物件。The property gets the regular expression used to evaluate password complexity for the object. 屬性設定在應用程式組態中，使用`passwordStrengthRegularExpression`屬性[元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的成員資格](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)組態項目。The property is set in the application configuration using the `passwordStrengthRegularExpression` attribute of the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) configuration element. ## Examples 下列範例所示[元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的成員資格](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)中的組態項目`system.web`應用程式的 Web.config 檔案區段。The following example shows the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) configuration element in the `system.web` section of the application's Web.config file. 它會指定應用程式使用的執行個體類別提供成員資格服務與集`passwordStrengthRegularExpression`屬性驗證的密碼是否符合下列條件的規則運算式：It specifies that the application use an instance of the class to provide membership services, and sets the `passwordStrengthRegularExpression` attribute to a regular expression that validates that the password meets the following criteria: - Is greater than 七個字元。Is greater than seven characters. - 包含至少一個數字。Contains at least one digit. - 包含至少一個特殊的 （非英數） 字元。Contains at least one special (non-alphanumeric) character. 如果密碼不符合這些準則，成員資格提供者不接受的密碼。If the password does not meet these criteria, the password is not accepted by the membership provider. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接受輸入使用者名稱和密碼解答，並產生新的隨機密碼，以指定的使用者。Takes, as input, a user name and a password answer and generates a new, random password for the specified user. > [!NOTE] > 所建立的隨機密碼方法不保證傳遞規則運算式中的屬性。The random password created by the method is not guaranteed to pass the regular expression in the property. 不過，隨機密碼將會符合所建立的準則和屬性However, the random password will meet the criteria established by the and properties 方法使用新的密碼值更新資料來源中的使用者資訊，並傳回新的密碼做為字串。The method updates the user information in the data source with the new password value and returns the new password as a string. 是一個方便的機制，來產生隨機密碼方法。A convenient mechanism for generating a random password is the method. 可確保旗標設為`true`然後再執行任何動作。 ensures that the flag is set to `true` before performing any action. 如果是`false`、擲回例外狀況。If is `false`, a exception is thrown. 也會檢查值屬性。 also checks the value of the property. 如果是`true`，會檢查提供的回應參數與資料來源中的預存的密碼解答的值。If is `true`, checks the value of the supplied answer parameter against the stored password answer in the data source. 如果不相符，擲回例外狀況。If they do not match, a exception is thrown. ## Examples 如需實作中，請參閱[實作設定檔提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98)。For an example of a implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 期間引發事件， ，和方法。The event is raised during the , , and methods. 事件發生之前要求的動作，讓使用者繼續或取消要求的動作。The event occurs before the action requested and enables the user to continue or cancel the requested action. 如果取消動作，使用者可以指定擲回例外狀況。If the action is canceled, the user can specify an exception to be thrown. 使用者使用事件處理常式加入指定的處理常式事件。Users use a event handler to specify a handler for the event. 提供者實作器可以使用虛擬方法，以引發事件。Provider implementers can use the virtual method to raise the event. ## Examples 如需實作中，請參閱[實作設定檔提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98)。For an example of a implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98).
